name: Slide Whistle
description: Although it is a simple toy, the slide whistle posesses an attractive potential for unforseen elevation and unlikely craft.

target_responses.take: The whistle feels less flimsy than you expected
target_responses.play: You produce a few shrill, slippery notes. It sounds niether great, nor horrible, evoking little emotion.

state_responses.broken_item: Bullishly, you rend the slide whistle into mishapen pieces.
